Question 1:\nWhat positive thing came from the golden arches?
A Chicken McNugget shaped like the Virgin Mary has been doing real miracles in Elkhart, Indiana.
A Big Mac might make you mayor of the town of Culver, Idaho.
McDonald\'s french fry oil might be the long sought cure for baldness.
Question 2:\nWhat stick actually made the news?
A British water companies was caught using dowsing rods to find water in this modern day and age.
An exercise program in which people are fetching sticks just like their dogs do.
A man who claims that his stick is, in fact, the very staff of Moses and has convinced people to pay him money to see it.

Question 5:\nGwyneth Paltrow, gets a lot of headlines for her lifestyle advice. Which of these is something that Gwyneth Paltrow has really told people to do?
Be nice to water because it has feelings.
Get stung by bees on purpose.
Take medical advice from a ghost
